str2: Happy, blessed, to be envied. A prolonged form of the poetical makar; supremely blest; by extension, fortunate, well off.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural

str2: Lawlessness, iniquity, disobedience, sin. From anomos; illegality, i.e. Violation of law or wickedness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To put a cover on, cover up. From epi and kalupto; to conceal, i.e. forgive.
